feed.title: Google Cloud: Cluster Toolkit
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Cluster Toolkit

entry.content:
Cluster Toolkit version v1.79.0 is available. This release enables Dynamic Workload Scheduler Flex-start provisioning for G4 instances.

For more information about this release and other minor changes, see the Release announcement on GitHub.
entry.summary: Cluster Toolkit version v1.79.0 has been released, introducing Flex-start provisioning for G4 instances with the Dynamic Workload Scheduler. This update enhances instance management capabilities. For detailed release notes, please visit the GitHub announcement.
entry.title: Feature: Cluster Toolkit v1.79.0 Now Available

entry.content:
Cluster Toolkit version v1.78.0 is available. This release adds a deprecation notice for the Parallelstore module. This version also adds support for gIB versions v1.1.1 and v1.1.0 for the Arm64-based architecture.

For more information about this release and other minor changes, see the Release announcement on GitHub.
entry.summary: Cluster Toolkit version v1.78.0 is now available. This release includes a deprecation notice for the Parallelstore module and adds support for gIB versions v1.1.1 and v1.1.0 on Arm64 architecture.
entry.title: Feature: Cluster Toolkit v1.78.0 Released

entry.content:
Cluster Toolkit version v1.77.0 is available. This release introduces a robust destroy process to help ensure that you can reliably delete resources from the Cluster Toolkit. This version also adds an automated Google Cloud resource cleanup script and integrates a Cloud Build pipeline to let you remove resources that are no longer required.

For more information about this release and other minor changes, see the Release announcement on GitHub.
entry.summary: Cluster Toolkit version v1.77.0 is now available, featuring a more robust destroy process for reliable resource deletion. This release also includes an automated cleanup script and Cloud Build integration for efficient resource removal.
entry.title: Feature: Cluster Toolkit v1.77.0 Released

entry.content: Cluster Toolkit version v1.76.0 is available. This release introduces an example NCCL test script for Slurm on GKE and makes the wait parameter for Kueue installation configurable, and adds a wait parameter for Kueue in the examples/gke-g4/gke-g4.yaml blueprint. For more information about this release, see the Release announcement on GitHub.
entry.summary: Cluster Toolkit version v1.76.0 is now available. This update includes a new NCCL test script for Slurm on GKE and enhances Kueue installation by making the 'wait' parameter configurable.
entry.title: Feature: Cluster Toolkit v1.76.0 Released

entry.content: Cluster Toolkit version v1.75.0 is available. This release graduates the cloud-storage-bucket module to the core collection of modules and adds integration tests for TPU v6e and TPU 7x. This version also enables Spot VM testing for A3 Ultra instances and provides ML dependencies and dual NIC guidance for G4 machines. For more information about this release, see the Release announcement on GitHub.
entry.summary: Cluster Toolkit v1.75.0 is now available, featuring the graduation of the `cloud-storage-bucket` module. This release also enhances testing capabilities for TPUs and specific instance types, along with providing guidance for ML dependencies and dual NIC configurations.
entry.title: Feature: Cluster Toolkit v1.75.0 Released

entry.content: Cluster Toolkit version v1.74.0 is available. This release adds support for Google Cloud NetApp Volumes and introduces new blueprint files for TPU 7x instances. This release also adds a force_conflicts flag that you can use when you apply manifests using the kubectl command. This release also updates the nccl-tcpxo-installer, nri-device-injector, and nccl-test values for a3-megagpu-8g machines. For more information about this release, see the Release announcement on GitHub.
entry.summary: Cluster Toolkit version v1.74.0 is now available, introducing support for Google Cloud NetApp Volumes and new blueprint files for TPU 7x instances. This release also includes a new `force_conflicts` flag for `kubectl` and updates for `a3-megagpu-8g` machines.
entry.title: Feature: Cluster Toolkit v1.74.0 Released

entry.content: Cluster Toolkit version v1.73.0 is available. This release adds support for the GKE Inference Gateway and adds a new blueprint for A3 High machines that automates the process of building a custom image with a TCPx-patched kernel for enhanced network performance. This version also includes an initial blueprint for G4 machine types and parameterized the gIB NCCL RDMA plugin installer in the gke-a4x.yaml blueprint. For more information about this release, see the Release announcement on GitHub.
entry.summary: Cluster Toolkit version 1.73.0 is now available. This release introduces support for the GKE Inference Gateway and adds new blueprints for A3 High machines and G4 machine types. It also includes improvements to the gIB NCCL RDMA plugin installer.
entry.title: Feature: Cluster Toolkit v1.73.0 Release

entry.content: Cluster Toolkit version v1.72.0 is available. This release adds support for Google Cloud Managed Lustre as an optional storage solution for the gke-tpu-v6-advanced blueprint. This release also adds four example blueprints to support the deployment of Sycomp storage. In addition, this release makes improvements to the gke-node-pool module and a4xhigh-slurm-blueprint.yaml blueprint. For more information about this release, see the Release announcement on GitHub.
entry.summary: Cluster Toolkit version v1.72.0 is now available, introducing support for Google Cloud Managed Lustre with the gke-tpu-v6-advanced blueprint. This update also includes new blueprints for Sycomp storage and improvements to the gke-node-pool module and a4xhigh-slurm-blueprint.yaml.
entry.title: Feature: Cluster Toolkit v1.72.0 Release

entry.content: Cluster Toolkit version v1.71.0 is available. This release includes a fix for a munge mount on login failure due to slow controller Slurm v6 setup, and adds Managed Lustre support in the gke-a4x blueprint. For more information about this release, see the Release announcement on GitHub.
entry.summary: Cluster Toolkit v1.71.0 is now available with improvements to Slurm setup and new Managed Lustre support.
entry.title: Feature: Cluster Toolkit v1.71.0

entry.content: Cluster Toolkit version v1.70.0 is available. This release adds automated TPU support and Cloud Storage FUSE mounts in the TPU v6 blueprint and refactors the H4D blueprint. This version also includes breaking changes, such as removing support for the maintenance_interval field for reservations created by Technical Account Managers (TAMs) and migrating Jobset from static manifests to a Helm chart. For a complete list of changes, see the Release announcement on GitHub.
entry.summary: Cluster Toolkit v1.70.0 is now available, introducing automated TPU support and Cloud Storage FUSE mounts for TPU v6 blueprints. This update also includes refactoring of the H4D blueprint and some breaking changes, such as the removal of the maintenance_interval field for TAM-created reservations and a migration of Jobset to a Helm chart.
entry.title: Feature: Cluster Toolkit v1.70.0 Released

entry.content: Cluster Toolkit version v1.69.0 is available. This release adds NUMA-aware scheduling in GKE clusters for G4 machines and adds a new module that provides mount scripts for WEKA filesystems. This version also includes PSA updates and adds a GKE sample for running the nvidia-bug-report shell script. For details, see the Release announcement on GitHub.
entry.summary: Cluster Toolkit v1.69.0 is now available, introducing NUMA-aware scheduling for G4 machines in GKE and a new module for WEKA filesystem mount scripts.
entry.title: Feature: Cluster Toolkit v1.69.0

entry.content:
Cluster Toolkit release version v1.68.0 is available. This release introduces the option to download the NVIDIA Collective Communications Library (NCCL) software packages libnccl2 and libnccl-dev for A3U and A4H machine types, as well as other minor changes. For more information about this release, see the Release Announcement on GitHub.

This release supports the generally available, open-source IBM Spectrum Symphony HostFactory connectors for Google Compute Engine and Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE), which can be deployed through Cluster Toolkit to extend your on-premises cluster or run entirely within Google Cloud. For more information, see Run IBM Spectrum Symphony workloads.
entry.summary: Cluster Toolkit v1.68.0 is now available, featuring NCCL software package downloads for A3U and A4H machines. This release also supports IBM Spectrum Symphony HostFactory connectors for Compute Engine and GKE, enabling hybrid or cloud-native deployments.
entry.title: Feature: Cluster Toolkit v1.68.0: NCCL Packages & IBM Spectrum Symphony Support

entry.content: Cluster Toolkit release version v1.67.0 is available. This release introduces additional support for aarch64-based architecture, as well as other minor changes. For more information about this release, see the Release Announcement on GitHub.
entry.summary: Cluster Toolkit is now available in version v1.67.0. This release adds support for aarch64-based architecture.
entry.title: Feature: Cluster Toolkit v1.67.0

entry.content: Cluster Toolkit release version v1.66.0 is available. This release enables Cloud Storage FUSE for H4D machine types and sets the default cluster availability to zonal, as well as other minor changes. For more information about this release, see the Release Announcement on GitHub.
entry.summary: Cluster Toolkit version v1.66.0 is now available, introducing Cloud Storage FUSE for H4D machine types and setting zonal availability as the default. This release also includes other minor enhancements.
entry.title: Feature: Cluster Toolkit v1.66.0

entry.content: Cluster Toolkit version v1.62.0 is available. This release adds new blueprints for A4X instances and introduces a community scheduler module for Slinky (Slurm on Kubernetes). For more details, see the Release announcement on GitHub.
entry.summary: Cluster Toolkit v1.62.0 is now available. This release includes new blueprints for A4X instances and a community scheduler module for Slinky.
entry.title: Feature: Cluster Toolkit v1.62.0
